archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0136
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to assess a customer's ability to repay a device on interest free via a credit check & other internal checks, so that I can reduce my risk of bad debt

properties.value: this should be a combination of a credit score we get from external provider and based on our internal checks. Complex rules are expected. Parked for after the credit check sprint is done.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
